extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Customer>, java.io.Serializable

    Customer

    The Customer class contains the definition and fundamental functions of the customer

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Customer
        phoneNr - The phone number of the Customer
        PIN - The PIN code of the Customer
        missingPayment - The pay status of the customer, true if customer has missing payments
        reminded - The reminded status of the customer, true if the customer has been reminded
